comment._content: I wonder if it's a wife, sister, or girl friend.

comment.author: 28733068@N07
comment._content: The beardless soldier on the right looks vaguely feminine. It was not unheard of for women to enlist, "pass" as men, and fight in the US Civil war.  However, this soldier looks to have an adams apple so likely not the case in this instance.

comment.author: 54995718@N05
comment._content: Looks like man and wife as I seem to see a ring on her ring finger.
